channel.title: HELP PLEASE~~'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
channel.description:
what the heck, i havnt touched my server for a week and it was working a week ago and now when i try to boot it up it says
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Whats going on!!! Please respond ASAP... PLEASE

item.title: HELP PLEASE~~'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

‘javac’ is not recognised as a internal or external command

Answer: This means that you have not installed java. You have to go to www.java.com and at the top, click Download Now. Then you wil be able to run your server and compile it.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP PLEASE~~'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,

EAch time i rune moparscape i get this and i cant play it anymore … can u plz anyone help me how to fix it!!!

‘JAVA’ is not reconized as an internal or external command,
operrable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue _ _ _

item.title: HELP PLEASE~~'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @Cullin1 Cullin1
item.description:
@Cullin1 wrote:

Don’t call people noobs. I HATE THAT WORD. It just proves your a noob for being impatient and not helping.

Now, Usaully it means you already have a different runserver up, Or you need to compile again before starting runserver again

Read full topic

item.title: HELP PLEASE~~'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @Zoolander Zoolander
item.description:
@Zoolander wrote:

Seriosuly man, that was uncalled for. i relize im a noob at this but everyone starts somewhere, i dont know how to set my varribles and i asked u to explain and u didnt. so unless u can contribute usefull information to aid me DONT SPAM MY POST…

Anyway, i booted up a backup coppy of my server now all im getting is

Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

I have had this error before but only when i tried to run my server twice at once. which im not doing now. so what is going on?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP PLEASE~~'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @Zoolander Zoolander
item.description:
@Zoolander wrote:

[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 12:23:17 PM[/size][hr]ok i found a jdk6u1, currently dling. if it works ty, and if not well stay tuned for more urgent plees for help
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 12:26:12 PM[/size][hr]WHAT THE HECK i did it, i DLed and instaled JDk-6u1
and now im getting this bull

Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

WHATS GOING ON!!!

sorry if i sound unpatient, i have been waiting for today to start up my server for a friend of mine to try it out, and i didnt touch anything and its being very un user friendly, also thx very much for helping[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 12:41:53 PM[/size][hr]OMFG now when i click on my comlier and run it from there i get the port error, and if i just click on my run server icon it goes back to the ‘java’ error!!! My errors ARNT EVEN CONSISTANT!!
